# The `TypeSwitch.h` File Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This file implements the TypeSwitch template, which mimics a switch() statement whose cases are type names. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

This file implements the TypeSwitch template, which mimics a switch() statement whose cases are type names.

<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">/// This class implements a switch-like dispatch statement for a value of &#39;T&#39;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">/// using dyn&#95;cast functionality. Each &#96;Case&lt;T&gt;&#96; takes a callable to be invoked</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if the root value isa&lt;T&gt;, the callable is invoked with the result of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">/// dyn&#95;cast&lt;T&gt;() as a parameter.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Example:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">///  Operation &#42;op = ...;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">///  LogicalResult result = TypeSwitch&lt;Operation &#42;, LogicalResult&gt;(op)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">///    .Case&lt;ConstantOp&gt;(&#91;&#93;(ConstantOp op) &#123; ... &#125;)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">///    .Default(&#91;&#93;(Operation &#42;op) &#123; ... &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> T, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typename</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ResultT = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typeswitch"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typeswitch/#a5f8b4c9ccb1bab34c84ccbd45a5ea30e">TypeSwitch</a> : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/typeswitchbase">detail::TypeSwitchBase</a>&lt;TypeSwitch&lt;T, ResultT&gt;, T&gt; &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typeswitch/#a0e98bbeaba6fbd292907110f3b350885"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">using </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typeswitch/#a0e98bbeaba6fbd292907110f3b350885">BaseT</a> = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/detail/typeswitchbase">detail::TypeSwitchBase&lt;TypeSwitch&lt;T, ResultT&gt;</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mips16isellowering-cpp/#a0acb682b8260ab1c60b918599864e2e5">T</a>&gt;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
